mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ORDER ( admin_id, store_id, address, detail_address, latitude, longitude, menu_name, menu_price, cooking_time, to_be_paid, message, phone, reservation, reservation_datetime, required_gender, device_os, status, created_datetime ) VALUES( 1, 1, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{cookingTime}, #{toBePaid}, #{message}, #{phone}, #{reservation}, #{reservationDatetime}, #{requiredGender}, #{deviceOs}, #{status}, now() )
